root.name: Crusaders: Thy Kingdom Come
root.description: OverviewBuilt on the same engine as King Arthur: The Role-playing Wargame, Crusaders: Thy Kingdom Come is medieval Real-Time Strategy game by Neocore Games. Unlike King Arthur, Crusaders is a mission-to-mission based RTS which follows the adventures of a rising knight within the crusader army, on its way to Jerusalem during the first crusade into The Holy Lands. Steam Support This game is available on Steam on Oct. 8, 2009. System Requirements Minimum: OS: Windows XP SP2 / Vista / Windows 7CPU: 2.4 Ghz Pentium IVRAM: 1 GBHDD: 3.4 GB free disk spaceGraphics Card: 128 MB Nvidia 6600 / ATI Radeon X700Sound Card: DirectX 9 CompatibleDirectX: Version 9.0c Recommended: OS: Windows XP SP2 / Vista / Windows 7CPU: Pentium Core 2 Duo E6400 (or better)RAM: 1.5 GBHDD: 3.4 GB free disk spaceGraphics Card: 256 MB Nvidia 8800 GT / ATI HD3870 (or better)Sound Card: DirectX 9 CompatibleDirectX: Version 9.0c
